job.title: Fully Remote Machine Learning Software Engineer - $180k+

job.description: Fully Remote AWS Machine Learning Software Engineer 180kltbrgtltbrgtThis organization is a platformbased company that uses machine learning to provide health systems with a single solution for automating revenue cycling operationsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtThe Ideal Candidate Will Haveltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt 45 years overall experience in Machine Learning or Data Engineeringltligtltligt Must have Python OR C development experienceltligtltligt Machine learning frameworks required TensorFlow preferredltligtltligt AWS experience preferredltligtltligt Natural Language Processing highly preferredltbrgtltligtltulgtThis company is RAPIDLY growing and never stopped growing during the pandemic They offer excellent benefits a competitive salary 401K and unlimited PTO They have a great career advancement structure and are looking for the best and brightest to join their excellent teamltbrgtltbrgtPlease apply ASAP if you are interested in learning more about this opportunity and we can set up a time to speak today mepsteinjeffersonfrankcomltbrgtltbrgtAWS  Software Engineer  Machine Learning  Python  C
